---
title: "Tobit Lagged"
date: "`r Sys.Date()`"
output: html_document
---

```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = FALSE, message = FALSE, warning = FALSE)

printtab <- function(x, skipNAs = FALSE) {
  x <- readr::read_csv(x)
  
  if (skipNAs)
    x <- x[!is.na(x[,1]),]
  
  for (j in 1:ncol(x))
    x[is.na(x[,j]),j] <- ""
  knitr::kable(x)
}
```

```{r, fig.align='center'}
knitr::include_graphics("../fig/corr_years_since_ratif_and_implementation.png")
```


# Summary statistics

```{r, results='asis'}
printtab("descriptive_stats.csv")
```

# Pvalues for Network effects of final model

```{r , results='asis'}
printtab("tobit_lagged_tabulate_model=Full_rhos.csv", skipNAs = TRUE)
```

# Final model

```{r , results='asis', comment=""}
for (i in c("05", "06", "08", "11", "13", "14")) {
  
  cat("\n\n## Article ", as.integer(i), "\n\n\n", sep="")
   
  print(printtab(
    sprintf("tobit_lagged_tabulate_model=Full-art=%s.csv", i), skipNAs = TRUE
  ))
  
}
```
